headline: Ameriprise Financial (NYSE:AMP) Sees 12% Weekly Dip As Global Trade Tensions Rise
summary: Ameriprise Financial (NYSE:AMP) experienced a decline of 12% over the past week, a move that coincided with a significant downturn in the broader market. The Dow Jones Industrial Average dropped over 2,200 points while the S&P 500 and Nasdaq saw declines of 6% and more, entering bear market territory. This widespread market sell-off was driven by heightened global trade tensions, particularly between the U.S. and China, leading to investor concerns about slower economic growth and rising...
